org.accada.reader.rprm.core.msg.transport
Class MessageInputStream

java.lang.Object
  org.accada.reader.rprm.core.msg.transport.MessageInputStream
Direct Known Subclasses:
HttpMessageInputStream, TcpMessageInputStream
public abstract class MessageInputStream
extends java.lang.Object

An input Stream that streams messages. The MessageInputStream is based on a simple InputStream which it processes in order to extract messages. The processing of the InputStream is done in the abstrace method processMessage() which should be implemented by each concrete instance of this abstract class.

Author:
Andreas Fürer, ETH Zurich Switzerland, Winter 2005/06
